pageContent: Objectives: Vasoactive drugs used for self-administered intracavernous injections are currently the reference treatments for erectile dysfunction after radical prostatectomy. The acceptability of and compliance with this treatment often limit their use. This study analysed these two parameters as a function of the type of andrological management decided before radical prostatectomy.

metaData.source:
The "Mini-Jupette" sling at the time of inflatable penile prosthesis implantation: Adequate treatment for erectile dysfunction with mild incontinence and/or climacturia after radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31300267/
